## Example
```markdown
# Agatha - Ad Spend Optimization Agent

AI-powered multi-agent system that analyzes ad spend, identifies waste, and recommends optimizations.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Backend
cd backend
cp .env.example .env
pip install -e .
uvicorn main:app --reload

# Frontend
cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev
```
